website_summaries.verdict: Small in size and ready to perform with modern digital use.
pros: Designed to be effective in as much as 11,000 gallons of water
May use its share of energy, but it does heat quickly in a variety of environments
cons: You might need to hire a professional to help configure the system

customer_reviews.title: It saves the ecosystem by not working. It's a crime Amazon allows these to be sold on their website
customer_reviews.text: Had electrician over 5 times. Got warm water from output for 1/2 hour then it stopped but at least I know what it's suppose to do. They claim the flow was too little, I turned it up, then the flow was too much I turned it down and got nothing but a $400. electric bill and a lot of false concern on how if they send me another pool heater, the same thing might happen. Tech support is useless. Explained how it heats slowly. This is for a hot tub. What heats a hot tub with cool water? Since it's seasonal and I bought it at the end of the season I doubt I'll get my $600 back. I'm furious.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Marasco

customer_reviews.title: You will need two 5O amp breakers to power the 18 size heater.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, added two fifty amp breakers to my shop sub panel and ran two 8-2 conductors, 4 wires, from breakers to power connection on heater. I'm using a 1.5 hp pool pump to pump the water from my pool to the heater which is in the shop about 50 away. Make sure you plumb inlet to bottom fitting and outlet to top fitting. It turns on automatically when it sees flow from the pool filter pump.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Gannon

customer_reviews.title: If you have a small pool and solar panels helping with electric bill this is the unit for you
customer_reviews.text: Install is straightforward if you are familiar with pool plumbing and electrical. PERSONAL RECOMMENDATION: This unit requires 3 sets of 8 gauge stranded wire which includes the ground so its a total of 9 wires. Make sure to use 1-1/4 conduit minimum since lines will give off some heat. i HAVE A 13,000 GALLON POOL and it took 2 days to get it from 68 to 83 degrees. the price is so inexpensive on the unit I installed unions so i can do an easy swap out in a few years since I have it outdoors. PROS: compact, inexpensive unit CONS: Internal plumbing a Bit noisy, adjustment knob is cheap plastic
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Eco 27 Model
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, been running this for about a week on a 28K gallon pool, unit tank is built well and made out of stainless steel despite older reviews saying it is not stainless possibly older model was not stainless? also cool feature is you do not need to have all three breakers on for example, i turned on only two of three breakers, (due to not having enough power in current load center) keeping one of the heating elements off and warmed pool quickly 6 degrees a day approximately
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Finicky and Tempermental, but great heat when it works.
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble with these before. First turn the item off then Shut the whole breaker off when you don’t want to use it, otherwise you will notice a higher electric bill even when it’s off, not sure why. Don’t use powder chemicals ever and you will save your heating coils. And be very careful to never shut off water flow until after you have shut off the item and (then) it’s breaker. If you follow that you will be happy. If you don’t follow all that you will have to replace coils, motherboard, etc by yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Muddy

customer_reviews.title: Not energy efficient at all!
customer_reviews.text: Caused high pressure in my filters which made it so was unable to use our automatic cleaner. Had to vacuum by hand while hooked up, also uses a ton of power not energy efficient at all. Now 60 days later it is on sale for $500 less for same unit very unhappy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heater Never Worked
customer_reviews.text: The heater was improperly put together at the manufacturer (this was validated with the manufacturer). The inlet and outlet of the heater are opposite causing the unit to shut down on the flow restriction.. We've tried for months to get this to work and it never has. We had to have an engineer look at it several times to finally figure out what was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: outer casing is already rusting after being used for only 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Product works great. Live in SWFL so we only need to turn heater on once in a while to get temp up a few degrees (spoiled, we require 87 pool temp) I am concerned since we have only had the heater for 6 months and the outer casing is already rusting. This product will definitely raise your electric bill.. We only turn on Friday morning and turn off Sunday afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: KIM

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Good pool heater if you use it rationale. Two years ago we bought the same brand water heater. We love both.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco P.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, so far...
customer_reviews.text: I only had this for 3 weeks before I closed my pool for the year. But when I turned it on my pool was 68 degrees and within 12 hours it was 86°. That evening it got down to 46 degrees, and when I woke up and checked the temperature it was still sitting at 86 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: definitely not plug and play
customer_reviews.text: Definitely need professionals to assist with power, and plumbing. 2-50amp circuits required to power, and separate water pump. Some sort of deckbox should be used to house the heater, to avoid getting wet. So expect extra cost in order to get it in working order. Technical support was very helpful with some minor issue I experienced the first few days.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi R Cook

customer_reviews.title: Company Honor's it's return policy.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, but stopped working. Had to get another water heating source.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Murf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This works great! It’s not cheap to run it but you can turn it off and the water stays warm for quite a while
customer_reviews.author: Dee Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price, easy to operate and looks great. My pool is 3700 gallons and it warmed 10 degrees in 4 hours. It doesn't operate at 100% all the time which save more energy when the pool gets the level of desidere degrees. I'll write additional information once I receive the power bill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does not work, intalled it professionaly twice!!
customer_reviews.text: it works for about 5 days then it stops working correctly, you cant even trouble shoot it because there is no guide! tech support is inexistent, this is the worst company ever.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.savecash

customer_reviews.title: I live in lake placid, Florida. The heater ...
customer_reviews.text: I live in lake placid, Florida. The heater took the pool water from 77 degrees to 83 degrees overnight. My pool is a little over 10000 gallons. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect the only issue is the difference in the energy bill

customer_reviews.title: Need to have better enclosure.
customer_reviews.text: It works good, but does not come with a water proof enclosure so you need to figure out how to cover it other wise it probably won't last a long time. I have a 22' round x 52" or 54" deep (about 10,000 gallons) aboveground pool and it takes about 1 hour to raise the temperature 1 Fahrenheit degree.

customer_reviews.title: company said they would make it good, they didnt
customer_reviews.text: hooked it up, didnt work...company said they would make it good, they didnt...i returned it
customer_reviews.author: Neil Ferrara

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst product out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product out there. The indoor ones work fine but the pool ones are really bad. I have had to replace components in all of them (I have 3 houses with them), have replaced 2 of them and on the last one (2 months old), it is already dead. The manufacturer sends you parts but that is it. Just the visits by the electrician or pool installer are adding up to the cost of the unit. I will be switching to conventional heat pumps.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: This unit didn't even last 2 years. It's installed in our pool in the Florida Keys and only gets used maybe, 3 months out of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Flickervine

customer_reviews.title: Good heater
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Heats my 35000 lt pool to 94 in two weeks and keeps it there. Very silent and eficient
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Morales

customer_reviews.title: Works well on my small inground pool (appx 13K gallons) ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my small inground pool (appx 13K gallons) in Vegas. Heated quickly and maintained well. I will use in fall/spring months.

customer_reviews.title: not pleased

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic heater!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic heater!! If it wasn't for this heater I wouldn't be going in the pool. The temp rises very fast leaving such a warm comfortable feeling as soon as you get in. It's so warm you can walk right in the pool!! Love it!!!

customer_reviews.title: perfect for our large semi-inground
customer_reviews.text: Had for about 2 years now...perfect for our large semi-inground. Heats up fast only need to use it when needed. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Willbillski

customer_reviews.title: I CAN SWIM IN THE WINTER
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working great. Easy to to use and warms the pool. Must have a solar blanket on the pool when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: This is not a good pool heater at all.
customer_reviews.text: This pool heater was ridiculous. It came with NO parts and very little instructions. I had to immediately return it. Whether it works or not, I'll never know. Even my pool technician could not really figure out how to install it. It doesn't come with any attachments (electrical or otherwise). It's just a metal box with some wires in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Ecosmart pool heater. The last one I purchased on Amazon October 8, 2020. It stopped heating December 16 after a little over 2 months use. I called tech support but warranty was not honored because I did not register the unit within 30 days. A new heating element (1 need 2) was quoted at $ 47.07 each. The new unit I paid $798.00 and I expected a longer than 2 month life expectancy. I recommend highly to look for another brand of pool heater and avoid Ecosmart.
customer_reviews.author: Bert van Middendorp

customer_reviews.title: Energy efficient
customer_reviews.text: Great product has kept our pool warm into early October.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Libarkin

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a month or two
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a month or two. Then tore up. First the heating elements then it just stopped working all together. Frequent emails to the company questioning my warranty with no reply. This is a waste of time. As for being efficient it doubled my power bill that month it worked

customer_reviews.title: On hold twice for over an hour
customer_reviews.text: After being on your company's hold que for over 1 hour (two separate occasions) and going from second in the que to third (somehow) I was not able to talk to an agent to find out what size heater I would need for my pool. If you publish a phone number at least pick up the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Marazzi

customer_reviews.title: Customer Support worked for me!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am deciding to purchase this product. I see all of these claims that "customer Service" is non existant and what not. I just called and it took about 1 minutes to have someone answer the phone @ Tech Support. And i used the # provided in the "answers" section. So what in the hell are you people talking about? I will change my STAR's when i actually get the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Venture

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this heater! Last it less than a year!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this heater! Last it less than a year, leaked through heating elements, and corrosion took care of the outside housing. Worse customer service ever. It was a hustle just trying to talk to someone on the phone. Even taking the trip to the manufacture was horrible( I live in Miami, Fl where they are located). I ended up buying a real heat pump exchange pool heater. Do no waste your time with this low budget electric heater.
customer_reviews.author: Monique & Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend...
customer_reviews.text: Have had this heater for 2 years...has been replaced replaced 4 times...and had to call tech maybe 6 or seven times to fix. Bought this because of space restriction. I would not recommend. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: nkstar
